item.description:
Merry Christmas all,

I'd like to have a Euro night - I was thinking of playing a game of SHOGUN. I have tomorrow (26th) off so if some of you want to come over earlier than normal, I'll be here ready to play something anytime. Shogun only allows for a maximum of 5 players (Daimyos).  We need to be ready to start playing this game by 7:00pm as it takes a long time to play. There are always other games to play if you don't get in on Shogun. If you are not accustomed to playing Euro games, it's whole different type of gaming that requires a fair amount of brain work to just get the mechanics of the game, forget about the stratgey.  It tends to be a bit overwhelming for the beginner player. If you are a beginner you are welcomed, but you need to commit to play the entire game.

Ok I hope some of you will be interested in coming over and playing some games.

I'll be serving dinner. Bring a $1.00 for our wonderful organizer, Nina.

Parking Logistics: Please park in the CVS or Funeral parking lots or on the street. No parking in the front or sides of the house. Cranky neighbor issues. :(

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Euro night at Marguerriiiitttttaaaasssss
